name: Alteric
description:
Only Yesterday You Were A Man.
Today Everything Has Changed.
You Died.
But your soul is still there. Itâ€™s a piece of light energy trapped in the alien space between two worlds.

Alteric
A single player 2D-platformer
Bright minimalistic graphics
Hardcore gameplay with physics, gravity and logic
2 interconnected parallel worlds
A variety of obstacles and dangerous bosses
Atmospheric soundtrack
intro: You are alone. Are you lonely? You're lost. Or stuck? Somewhere...but where? And most importantly, who are you?
